DOC.brief_summary: Near infrared spectroscopy offers the possibility of noninvasive and continuous bedside investigation of cerebral oxygenation in newborn infants. Using this technique we investigated the relationship between changes in cerebral oxygenation and hemodynamics, and changes in some physiological variables during blood transfusion in anaemic preterm infants.
DOC.brief_title: Measurement of Cerebral and Peripheric Tissue Oxygenation in Anemic Preterm Infants Who Underwent Blood Transfusion
DOC.criteria: <32 gestational age and/or <1500gr.,>30th day preterm infants sepsis,shock,severe intracranial hemorrhage,NEC,abdominal and cranial surgery
DOC.keyword: anemic preterms, cerebral oxygenation,somatic oxygenation, blood transfusion
